project.objective: Streamdata.io is a 9-year-old software company with customers in 7 european countries for its on-premise product, Motwin. Streamdata.io is also a new development tool specialized in real time applications for connected objects (Internet of Things), web browsers, smartphones and tablets, offering 90% savings versus current solutions in terms of technical, economical and environmental impact. Targeted applications are covering various fields such as finance, news, media, e-commerce, and transportation. The main objective of this project is the enshrinement of the leading position of Streamdata.io to disseminate its technology to developers worldwide through partnerships and direct sales. To do so, virality mechanisms -content marketing, benchmarks, demonstrations, extensions, developer conferences- should be implemented for Streamdata.io to be known then accepted by the growing number of users facing the challenge of creating scalable real-time applications.
project.title: x66 optimized APIs real-time transformation in just 4 hours
